title: The Shadow
description: In this Dateline classic, a home in a small Iowa town is disturbed in the middle of the night by an intruder. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on September 11, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
